question: Which of the following incident started the violence in Punjab before the Jallianwala Bagh Massacre?
option2: Arrest of Dr. Saifuddin Kitchlu and Dr. Satyapal
answer: Arrest of Dr. Saifuddin Kitchlu and Dr. Satyapal
explanation: On 10th April, two leaders of Punjab Dr. Saifuddin Kitchlu and Dr. Satyapal were arrested and deported to an undisclosed place without any trial. It created a turmoil situation in Punjab.
